chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Que si! Primero toma la izquierda desde la mapa en la parte arriba en la derecha.
genial! ahora estoy al lado del palito que lleva a una pequeña isla con un tigre en ella
Whats Next?
Take a left to go on top of the bird.
alright, buddy! currently, there's no bird nearby
Veo una ramita, un tigre, unas islas con una mariposa y un loro, un elefante y más. ¿Hacia dónde debo dirigirme desde el punto de partida?
Go on top of the loro and around it underneath it is rocks to go the rana. go there
aight, on my way around the parrot to reach those rocks
now, heading towards the frog. what's next?
go under the frog to the right of the frog, then make a u turn and turn back under the frog to cross the isla over the back of the alligator
getting around the frog, then the ol' u-turn trick under him
Muy bien, ahora me dirijo a la isla y veo al caimán cruzando sobre su espalda. ahora, ¿hacia dónde?
go on the caiman and then up left to cross the rocks to make it to the giraffe, then move down to cross to the island and over the snake to the treasure
okay, let's do this
i'm on the crocodile, now taking a leap over the rocks to get to the giraffe
move down to cross to the island and over the snake to the treasure okay, let's do this
alright, movin' down with the giraffe, jumping over the snake, and
*finalizado*! ¡El tesoro es mío, digo nuestro, amigo! Qué viaje tan divertido y aventurero, ¿no? gracias por las indicaciones!
hi there, empezamos?
si
great! let's start from the white dog. take a couple steps west, then cross the trail heading toward the florist stand
¡pero espera! Antes de llegar al puesto, haz un rápido giro en U hacia la izquierda y cruza el sendero nuevamente, regresando hacia nuestro amigo peludo. ¿entiendo?
Si
cool! now, traverse southwards across that branch and keep moving down
you'll spot another white dog chilling by a red and white picnic mat. let me know when you get there!
im there
awesome! now, go over the mat and make a beeline for that bowl of berries
después de eso, haga un rápido recorrido hacia el oeste. ¡Mira dónde terminas!
the fish are in front of me
seems like we went off track, buddy
let's get back to the berries and from there, let's find a wooden branch that leads north. cross it
ok crossed it
brilliant! now, see that green bush? circle it from the right until you get to the florist stand
¡Pero ten cuidado de no tocarlo!
ok
good! now, take a sharp left, go under the stand, and move west until you see a big bridge with cyclists on it
let me know when you're there
ok
awesome! keep walking west past the bridge
Después de un rato, deberías ver a dos ancianos leyendo periódicos en un banco. dime cuando llegues a ese punto
ok
good! now move south a few steps, between the old folks and another wooden branch, to a green bush right next to the end of the branch
ok
great job! from that bush, go east, keeping the wooden branch on one side and the bush on the other
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
Start at the tent. Move down to the left of the bush directly below the tent, then to the left of the bush that is on the left side of the dog.
alrighty then, passed the first bush and now by the dog
there's a fire on the right, should i head that way or keep going south?
Keep going south and circle around the dog. when you are below the dog make sure you go onto the path below the dog
gotcha, walked around the pupper and i'm on the path below
Acabo de ver un hongo rojo original a la derecha. ¿Cómo es el siguiente paso?
go up to the right between the dog and the fire, then above the fire to the right and then below the mushroom go back onto the path
okay, zig-zagged between the dog and fire, now under the mushroom on the path again
what's next?
go right until you are above the headlights of the car, then take a u turn while staying on the trail and go back to the left on the trail.
Hice exactamente lo que dijiste, te hice girar y ahora te dirigiste a la izquierda por el sendero.
stay on the trail and go south on the trail, following the trail until you are right above the telescope
done and done
i'm above the telescope now. what next?
go right around the telescope to the right making sure not to touch the telescope
hecho, contorneé la lente sin tocarlo
¿ahora qué?
go between the telescope and the bush to the right of it going south
alright, just squeezed between the telescope and the bush
i see some rocks ahead
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
where do i go
hey, start under that first palm tree and head towards the second one
swerve left before you hit the third one and continue straight south
i'm above the dog
sweet! now just veer a bit to the left of the cute puppy, then back right towards the south
¡sigue adelante!
i'm to the left of the puppy
good! now you're gonna want to go between those two rocks up ahead
yep, the big one on your left and the small one on your right. aim for the ocean!
ok i'm above the crab
rad! now turn right
Dirígete hacia el oeste y mantente cerca de ese gran amigo rocoso tuyo.
do i go on top of the crab
jason bourne would go over it, but i'd suggest 'no'
continue westwards in the water instead. let's treat the crab nicely, shall we?
i'm still above the crab do i go left or right
¡Ve a la derecha, amigo! Sigue la roca y continúa hacia el oeste en el agua.
the crab is to my bottom left
perfect, now keep moving and you'll come across a medium rock, follow along it
look out for the shark ahead!
so go around the crab to the right bottom of it
you got it, champ! swing around the nameless crab, head straight until you hit the medium rock
¡Mantén esa roca a tu izquierda!
which one is the medium rock
it's the one in front of you, after the crab but before the shark
you can't miss it!
ok
awesome
¿Ves ese tiburón más adelante? Gire bruscamente a la derecha antes de llegar.
i'm to the right of the shark
sweet moves! now, time to get back on land
look for a path between the medium rock and a colorful ball
ok i'm between those two
bravo! now, veer a bit to your left and head north

general_survey.answer: speak both languages daily at home
